description: A man with a disproportionately large head and torso arrives at a holiday party. Situated directly above the entrance is a sprig of mistletoe. His initial attempt at a formal introduction is immediately abandoned for an excited exclamation upon noticing the strategically placed plant. This abrupt shift from social pleasantry to eager anticipation of a holiday tradition, combined with his unusual physique, highlights the humorous absurdity of the social interaction. The surprised reactions of the other guests further emphasize the unexpected nature of his entrance and focus.
caption: “Hello, I'm Clarence Jones from Bill's office and ... Oh! Hey! Mistletoe!”
